api_url.Description: the url for the gridscale API.

change_time.Description: The date and time of the last object change.

create_time.Description: The date and time the object was initially created.

current_price.Description: Defines the price for the current period since the last bill.

delete_block.Description: Defines if the object is administratively blocked. If true, it can not be deleted by the user.

failover.Description: Sets failover mode for this IP. If true, then this IP is no longer available for DHCP and can no longer be related to any server.

location_country.Description: Formatted by the 2 digit country code (ISO 3166-2) of the host country

location_iata.Description: Uses IATA airport code, which works as a location identifier

location_name.Description: The human-readable name of the location. It supports the full UTF-8 charset, with a maximum of 64 characters

location_uuid.Description: Helps to identify which datacenter an object belongs to

name.Description: The human-readable name of the object. It supports the full UTF-8 charset, with a maximum of 64 characters.

reverse_dns.Description: Defines the reverse DNS entry for the IP Address (PTR Resource Record).

change_time.Description: The date and time of the last object change

create_time.Description: The date and time the object was initially created

current_price.Description: Defines the price for the current period since the last bill.

delete_block.Description: Defines if the object is administratively blocked. If true, it can not be deleted by the user.

failover.Description: Sets failover mode for this IP. If true, then this IP is no longer available for DHCP and can no longer be related to any server.

location_country.Description: Formatted by the 2 digit country code (ISO 3166-2) of the host country

location_iata.Description: Uses IATA airport code, which works as a location identifier

location_name.Description: The human-readable name of the location. It supports the full UTF-8 charset, with a maximum of 64 characters

location_uuid.Description: Helps to identify which datacenter an object belongs to

name.Description: The human-readable name of the object. It supports the full UTF-8 charset, with a maximum of 64 characters.

reverse_dns.Description: Defines the reverse DNS entry for the IP Address (PTR Resource Record).

algorithm.Description: The algorithm used to process requests. Accepted values: roundrobin/leastconn.

forwarding_rule.Description: List of forwarding rules for the Load balancer.

listen_ipv4_uuid.Description: The UUID of the IPv4 address the Load balancer will listen to for incoming requests.

listen_ipv6_uuid.Description: The UUID of the IPv6 address the Load balancer will listen to for incoming requests.

location_uuid.Description: Helps to identify which datacenter an object belongs to.

name.Description: The human-readable name of the object. It supports the full UTF-8 charset, with a maximum of 64 characters

redirect_http_to_https.Description: Whether the Load balancer is forced to redirect requests from HTTP to HTTPS

status.Description: Status indicates the status of the object.

change_time.Description: The date and time of the last object change

create_time.Description: The date and time the object was initially created

delete_block.Description: If deleting this network is allowed

l2security.Description: MAC spoofing protection - filters layer2 and ARP traffic based on source MAC

location_country.Description: Formatted by the 2 digit country code (ISO 3166-2) of the host country

location_iata.Description: Uses IATA airport code, which works as a location identifier

location_name.Description: The human-readable name of the location. It supports the full UTF-8 charset, with a maximum of 64 characters

location_uuid.Description: Helps to identify which datacenter an object belongs to

name.Description: The human-readable name of the object. It supports the full UTF-8 charset, with a maximum of 64 characters.

network_type.Description: The type of this network, can be mpls, breakout or network.

status.Description: status indicates the status of the object

auto_recovery.Description: If the server should be auto-started in case of a failure (default=true).

availability_zone.Description: Defines which Availability-Zone the Server is placed.

console_token.Description: If the server should be auto-started in case of a failure (default=true).

legacy.Description: Legacy-Hardware emulation instead of virtio hardware. If enabled, hotplugging cores, memory, storage, network, etc. will not work, but the server will most likely run every x86 compatible operating system. This mode comes with a performance penalty, as emulated hardware does not benefit from the virtio driver infrastructure.

location_uuid.Description: Helps to identify which datacenter an object belongs to.

memory.Description: The amount of server memory in GB.

name.Description: The human-readable name of the object. It supports the full UTF-8 charset, with a maximum of 64 characters

action.Description: This defines what the firewall will do. Either accept or drop.

dst_cidr.Description: Either an IPv4/6 address or and IP Network in CIDR format. If this field is empty then all IPs have access to this service.

dst_port.Description: A Number between 1 and 65535, port ranges are seperated by a colon for FTP

order.Description:
The order at which the firewall will compare packets against its rules, 
a packet will be compared against the first rule, it will either allow it to pass or block it 
and it won t be matched against any other rules. However, if it does no match the rule, 
then it will proceed onto rule 2. Packets that do not match any rules are blocked by default.

src_cidr.Description: Either an IPv4/6 address or and IP Network in CIDR format. If this field is empty then this service has access to all IPs.

src_port.Description: A Number between 1 and 65535, port ranges are seperated by a colon for FTP

dst_cidr.Description: Either an IPv4/6 address or and IP Network in CIDR format. If this field is empty then all IPs have access to this service.

storage.Description: A list of storages attached to the server. The first storage in the list is always set as the boot storage of the server.

change_time.Description: The date and time of the last object change

create_time.Description: The date and time the object was initially created

name.Description: The human-readable name of the object. It supports the full UTF-8 charset, with a maximum of 64 characters.

sshkey.Description: sshkey_string is the OpenSSH public key string (all key types are supported => ed25519, ecdsa, dsa, rsa, rsa1)

capacity.Description: The capacity of a storage in GB.

change_time.Description: Defines the date and time of the last object change.

create_time.Description: Defines the date and time the object was initially created.

license_product_no.Description: If a template has been used that requires a license key (e.g. Windows Servers) this shows the product_no of the license (see the /prices endpoint for more details).
